title: ColaKing
author: ColaKing
content: We are a huge community from China. At present, we have mastered 40% of the community activities in the Chinese area. We are committed to the promotion, listing, and listing of new Pow projects. We are completely free and only need your coins. This copy is permanently valid , you can comment your project belowThe resources that we can provide1.Ninety percent of the pools on the market are associated with us2.It has a large Chinese-speaking community3.He has more than 20,000 followers on Youtube and Twitter4.Worked with some of the dealers,Can be brought to market fasterLet's get restless, we'll be screening projects, it's going to be toughã€‚You can leave a message when I'm not online, and I'll get back to you as soon as I see itOur Screening Provides Information1.Website2.Github3.White PaperAnd you can also briefly introduce your project, which will make me more interested in itOne more thing, I will only ask you for coins after I make my actions, we only pay attention to the development of Pow

comments.author: RedEyeSTD
comments.body: Hello! I'd like to introduce oBTC.oBTC is a bitcoin fork with a new algo - heavyhash. HeavyHash is unique because it can be mined on OPUs (that is, optical processing units), which excel in some areas compared to GPUs/CPUs. The OPUs are developed by PoWx, a non-profit dedicated to developing PoW cryptography compatible with ultra-energy efficient optical computing.The PoWx website can be found here: https://www.powx.org/The official optical bitcoin site is hosted here: https://www.opticalbitcoin.org/You may read the oPoW whitepaper here: https://assets.pubpub.org/xi9h9rps/01581688887859.pdfThe GitHub organization: https://github.com/powx-orgThe oBTC-core is found here: https://github.com/PoWx-Org/obtc-coreLooking forward to working with you, cheers ðŸ¥‚

comments.author: ColaKing
comments.body: Cool You are the first one to reply to me. I will carefully check this project. I hope we can keep in touch
